channel.title: CVE Feed for SonicWall -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SonicWall -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-22273|2024-06-05T19:07:02.266Z -- sonicwall -- sonicwall%20sra%2Fsma100
item.description: Improper neutralization of Special Elements leading to OS Command Injection vulnerability impacting end-of-life Secure Remote Access (SRA) products and older firmware versions of Secure Mobile Access (SMA) 100 series products, specifically the SRA appliances running all 8.x, 9.0.0.5-19sv and earlier versions and Secure Mobile Access (SMA) 100 series products running older firmware 9.0.0.9-26sv and earlier versions

item.title: CVE-2024-22396|2024-03-14T03:15:55.008Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description: An Integer-based buffer overflow vulnerability in the SonicOS via IPSec allows a remote attacker in specific conditions to cause Denial of Service (DoS) and potentially execute arbitrary code by sending a specially crafted IKEv2 payload.
